arts.ttl: New face spotted in Barcelona training before Real Oviedo
arts.sum: A highly-regarded up-and-coming member of the youth ranks at La Liga champions Barcelona was afforded a call-up to senior training at the Ciutat Esportiva on Wednesday. The player in question?…

arts.ttl: Hansi Flick talks Gavi, Lamine, Pedri, Balde, de Jong, Cubarsi, Bernal, Camp Nou ahead of Real Oviedo vs Barcelona
arts.sum: FC Barcelona continued their winning run as they hosted Getafe in their last La Liga game, beating the Madrid side 3-0. As things stand, the Blaugranes have won four league matches and drawn one, against Rayo Vallecano. The Catalans are expected to continue with this form as they face Real Oviedo in their next league […] The post Hansi Flick talks Gavi, Lamine, Pedri, Balde, de Jong, Cubarsi, Bernal, Camp Nou ahead of Real Oviedo vs Barcelona appeared first on Sempre Barca.

arts.ttl: Barcelona star ruled out of Real Oviedo clash
arts.sum: A member of the defensive ranks at La Liga champions Barcelona will not be available for the club’s next outing. The player in question? Alejandro Balde. Stopper Balde has for…

arts.ttl: Barcelona winger ruled out of Real Oviedo clash but targets comeback against Real Sociedad
arts.sum: Although he made headlines recently by winning the Kopa Trophy and finishing second in the Ballon d’Or 2025 rankings, the FC Barcelona forward Lamine Yamal has been unable to participate in the last few games for his team. The 18-year-old forward has been struggling with pubalgia (groin discomfort) and has already missed games against Valencia, […] The post Barcelona winger ruled out of Real Oviedo clash but targets comeback against Real Sociedad appeared first on Sempre Barca.
